user_query: I want to impress my friends with some interesting facts. Can you give me a trivia fact about the number 42 and a fact about the year 1492? Also, I need the exchange rate from Singapore Dollars to Malaysian Ringgit.

TaskList.description: Retrieve a trivia fact about the number 42.
Retrieve a trivia fact about the year 1492.
Obtain the current exchange rate from Singapore Dollars to Malaysian Ringgit.
